Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 20 h
Metabolism: via hydrolysis and conjugation, forms metabolites
Excretion: feces (85%), urine (6%)

Mechanism_of_Action.text: Antagonize effect of acetylcholine on muscarinic receptors, reduce smooth muscle tone of the bladder
